manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Dott Arts Dimmable LED Desk Lamp with Wireless Charger This new led desk light features 5 color mode and fully dimming function, you could adjust the colors and brightness according to your using environment. Create the perfect ambience for your life.. Multi-angle adjustment and foldable design for more flexible light and most space saving. Wireless charging can fast charge compatible iPhone and Samsung devices with QI wireless charging. Handy timer and night light design provide you with more convenience at night, perfect choice for reading, study and work.

Work Your Way Dott Arts foldable led desk lamps With 230° adjustable arm and 90° rotating axis base, rotating shaft base can be rotated to 170 ,the led lamp can be adjusted to any your preferred angle. You can choose the best lighting angle to accommodate different requirements. Eye-friendly LED Desk Lamp & Auto-Off Timer This Led desk lamp have 5 color modes and fully dimming function, you could adjust the colors and brightness according to your using environment.0.5/1 Hour Auto-off time, making sleep more comfortable, no need to worry about turning off. Folable & Compact Design Its foldable design allows you to take it around easily and save more space.Desk light designed with touch control,operate and respond with straight-forward touch controls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Efficient and Stylish: LED Desk Lamp Brightens Up Your Workspace
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the LED Desk Lamp and I must say, it has truly transformed my workspace. With its full dimmable touch feature and 5 color modes, this lamp allows me to adjust the brightness to my liking and create the perfect ambiance for any task. The gradual dimming from 0 to 100% brightness is a game changer and adds a touch of sophistication to my desk.One of the standout features of this lamp is its wireless charging capability. The base of the lamp acts as a wireless charger, making it convenient to charge my Qi-enabled devices such as my iPhone 11 and Samsung S9 Plus. Gone are the days of cluttered cables and searching for chargers - this lamp truly integrates technology seamlessly into your workspace.The addition of the auto-off timer is another fantastic feature. Whether I'm working, reading, or even sleeping, I can simply touch the timer and the lamp will automatically turn off after 30 or 60 minutes. It's a small yet thoughtful feature that adds convenience to my daily routine.The foldable and portable design of this lamp is also worth mentioning. With its flexible arm and rotating base, it can be easily adjusted to save desk space and stored away when not in use. Its modern design complements any decor, making it a versatile addition to any office or bedroom.What really sets this desk lamp apart is its commitment to eye care. The soft, stable, and non-flickering light ensures that my eyes are not strained during long working hours. With a lifespan of over 50000 hours, this lamp is built to last for more than 25 years, eliminating the hassle of bulb changes.Overall, the LED Desk Lamp from Dott Arts is a must-have for anyone seeking to enhance their workspace. With its wide range of features and sleek design, it combines functionality with style. Additionally, the 365-day worry-free service and lifetime customer support provided by the manufacturer give me peace of mind. I highly recommend this lamp - it's a game changer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and bright.
reviews.reviewText: Gives off a great deal of light. I like that it's compact and fits on my desk. They controls are easy to use and there is a timer and dimmer. I really liked this for the phone charging feature but it not the fastest. Overall a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice home Desk Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Got this for my home Office and looks really sharp pm my desk, Works well, very bright light on the higher settings , Great features like cell charging , dimmer, timer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I brought it for a friend. He said the lamp is the best thing I could have gotten him. He likes the dimness and the angles that he can move around. The wireless charging part he said he loves it no more reaching for wires.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a GREAT product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Simply can't beat this product. Simplistic footprint, different light variations, a phone charger and a timer. All for $20. Can't beat it. I purchased 3, and will likely purchase 3-5 more (some as gifts for my college age kids). EXCELLENT PRODUCT!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s good and brightI like it a lot

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST PURCHASE EVER
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this lamp! Took me like five minutes to set up. You can change the brightness easily and it looks very neat and doesn't take up too much room. My only complaint is that it takes a while for the wireless charging to detect anything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Update: After a week or two of use the touch panel will intermittently stop working and I have to unplug and plug back in the lamp. Save yourself the time and buy something else. Original: The hinge is heavier weight than I expected which gives a feeling of quality. I am sensitive to hums and mine is not humming. I like the adjustable color temp. It’s bright enough for reading. The cord is a little short and it’s USB. It’s like 4 or 5 feet long so had to move the lamp to the other side of my bedside table to reach outlet. The placement of the phone on the wireless charger is not too finnicky, I don’t really have to pay attention too much to where I set it down, and i tried moving the phone around to see if it would keep charging and it does. It probably has about a 2-3 inch radius to where it has to be line up to work which is normal. Ya it chargers slow because it’s a 5w charger but slow charging over night is fine. If you need a fast top up use a fast charger, not this. For the price I’m super happy I can read at night without turning on the overhead lights.
